name: Not Just a Dreamer
description:
This is a game about a little dreamer.

This little girl loves to explore what she hears about in school, and can sometimes even be seen staring off into space, but.... such is the gift of a deeply engaged dreamer!

Help this dreamer traverse her classes and explore all the whimsical nooks and crannies of the subjects she's learning about!

Edit: POST - JAM

I wasn't able to upload an android version in time for the jam, but i added one for anyone's convenience in this thread.  The audio was slightly remixed (made the pinwheel softer) but otherwise no different from Jam version
